name: Quaal's Feather Token, Tree
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Tree
entries: You must be outdoors to use this token. You can use an action to touch it to an unoccupied space on the ground. The token disappears, and in its place a nonmagical oak tree springs into existence. The tree is 60 feet tall and has a 5-foot-diameter trunk, and its branches at the top spread out in a 20-foot radius.
